text: The Heidelberg Catechism is an important Protestant document. It was written in 1563 in Heidelberg, Germany. It was intended to teach the faith of the Christian Reformed Church. It was commissioned by Elector Frederick III. ==Related pages== *Three Forms of Unity ==Other websites== *CRCNA Category:1563 Category:Calvinism Category:Heidelberg Category:Protestant theology Category:Christian texts
title: Heidelberg Catechism
